__e: Look at the drapes and the church outside.
I was just thinking get some candles, close the curtains, have yourself a little séance, and ask Pettigrew what the fuck it was he found before they killed him.
I get him his breakfast, I take it all the way upstairs, I lay it in front of him, hand him his newspaper, I tidy the room, draw the curtains, guess what he says?
They just want to be alone, if only someone would pull the shades.
Lock your door, tighten the curtains and you go to sleep.
Then why are we closing the curtains and locking the door?
